wrath.util

Class Encryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.util.Encryptor

  • public class Encryptor
extends java.lang.Object
    Library to Encrypt and Decrypt byte data. Uses AES Encryption Algorithm. Only static methods are thread-safe. Make sure to install JCE Unlimited Strength Jurisdiction Policy Files. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Java_Cryptography_Extension

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Constructor.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the encryption object by destroying sensitive key data.

      • decryptData

        public byte[] decryptData(byte[] encryptedData)
        Decrypts specified data.
        Parameters:
        encryptedData - The encrypted data to decrypt.
        Returns:
        Returns the decrypted data according to specifications. If decryption failed, returns original encrypted data.

      • decryptData

        public static byte[] decryptData(byte[] encryptedData,
                                 javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Decrypts specified data using specified key.
        Parameters:
        encryptedData - The encrypted data to decrypt.
        key - The security key to decrypt the data.
        Returns:
        Returns the decrypted data according to specifications. If decryption failed, returns original encrypted data.
        See Also:
        generateKey(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • encryptData

        public byte[] encryptData(byte[] originalData)
        Encrypts specified data.
        Parameters:
        originalData - The data to encrypt.
        Returns:
        Returns the encrypted data according to specifications. If encryption failed, returns original data.

      • encryptData

        public static byte[] encryptData(byte[] originalData,
                                 javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Encrypts specified data using specified key.
        Parameters:
        originalData - The data to encrypt.
        key - The security key to encrypt the data.
        Returns:
        Returns the encrypted data according to specifications. If encryption failed, returns original data.
        See Also:
        generateKey(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • generateKey

        public static javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec generateKey(java.lang.String key)
        Generates a key with no salt using AES. This is NOT recommended.
        Parameters:
        key - The key, or passphrase, to generate the security key with.
        Returns:
        Returns the Key object for cyptography.
